snippet: Michelle Obama kicked off a three-day, four-state trip to mark the second anniversary of her signature initiative to reduce childhood obesity.
abstract: Michelle Obama kicked off a three-day, four-state trip to mark the second anniversary of her signature initiative to reduce childhood obesity.
lead_paragraph: DES MOINES -- Michelle Obama kicked off a three-day, four-state trip to observe the second anniversary of "Let's Move!," her signature initiative to reduce childhood obesity, with a raucous pep rally at an arena here, during which the first lady led the crowd in dancing the "Interlude."

headline.main: In Iowa, Michelle Obama Says, 'Let's Move!'
